message: Hello Bob, I have a great product for you. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $180 is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.
I understand you think $180 is high, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $160.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $150 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $165. That's the lowest I can go.
I'm really close to walking away. I'm willing to pay $155 for the product.
I'm not going to go any lower than $162. This is my final offer.
I'm still not convinced. I'm willing to pay $152 for the product.
